name: Media-Agent Network
tag_list: media, planning, buying, advertising, drtv, tv, radio, print, online, agency, marketing, usa, spain, uk, germany
overview:
A global full-service advertising, media buying and media-planning network, delivering cost- and response-efficient campaigns in the full range of communication-channels worldwide.

Media-Agent based in Palma (Spain) with representations in London and New York has expanded to meet the needs of clients globally, offering a full range of services in over 20 countries worldwide covering Europe, the USA, Asia and Latin America. The expert executive team brings a wealth of media and marketing experience as well as strong proactive relationships with media owners worldwide.

Online, (DR)TV, radio or print â€“ the Media-Agent team develops strong and effective media planning and placement to provide optimal solutions in achieving business goals.
